Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class StartHighlightObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.StartHighlightObject
public class StartHighlightObject
extends AbstractObject
An object that will be visible behind the starting PassageObject basically as a highlight for it
